antispoof-desc: Edey block de accounts wey dem dey create plus mixed-script, confusing den similar usernames
antispoof-conflict-top: De username "$1" be too similar give de following {{PLURAL:$2|username|usernames}}:
antispoof-conflict-bottom: Abeg make you choose anoda username.
antispoof-name-illegal:
So say ego prevent confusion, you no go fi use de username "$1": $2.
Abeg make you choose anoda ussername.
